title: Playlist and steering controls don't work.
content: I just purchased a pixel ,4xl.  It connects to my Honda CRV 2015 HANDS FREE LINK.  MY DOWNLOADED MUSIC PLAYS BUT DOES NOT SHOW UP ON CAR SCREEN, AND THE ADVANCE BUTTONS ON STEERING WHEEL DO NOT WORK.  MY PREVIOUS PHONE IS AN LG4 WHICH WORKED ON IT JUST FINE.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
